scripts.start: sh -c 'pid=$(lsof -ti tcp:8000); if [ -n "$pid" ]; then kill -9 $pid 2>/dev/null || true; fi; chroma run --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --path apps/backend/chroma & npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend & wait'
scripts.stop: sh -c 'for p in 3001 5173 8000; do pid=$(lsof -ti tcp:$p); if [ -n "$pid" ]; then kill $pid 2>/dev/null || true; fi; done'
